solution_line_template: If each battery charge costs ${cost_per_charge}, the total expense of {num_charges} battery charges is {num_charges}*{cost_per_charge} = $<<{num_charges}*{cost_per_charge}={total_expense}>>{total_expense}.
After his expense on battery charging, his balance was {budget}-{total_expense} = $<<{budget}-{total_expense}={balance}>>{balance}.
